guidanceItem.title: Remote logons are restricted.
guidanceItem.Priority: J.D. Meier, Alex Mackman, Michael Dunner, Srinath Vasireddy, Ray Escamilla and Anandha Murukan
guidanceItem.content:
Applies to

  • Web Application

What to Check For

Check to ensure that Access this computer from the network privilege is removed from the Everyone group to restrict who can log on to the server remotely.

Adapted from Microsoft patterns & practices guidance.
